title: Safe Breaker Braum

embed.description: Find More Art Daily Deviations Critiques Critiqueable Wallpaper Random Random Deviant Random Deviation Random Group

body: I was trolling around on deviant art when I came across this I am an avid braum player (who isn't) and I thought this would be an awesome addition to the Mafia ADC skins as the support in the line up.

replies.body: Shouldn't it be safe *cracker*?
That's racist.

> [{quoted}](name=Xyrne,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=rhpOdFW5,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-08-30T15:10:41.615+0000)
>
> That's racist.

Not without a comma after 'safe'.
Lemme drop some knowledge:
Shouldn't it be safe, cracker? <----- Racist
Shouldn't it be safe cracker? <----- Not Racist

(This has been brought to you by the letters 'F', 'U', and the number '2'!)
english major alert
or someone who listened in 4th grade

*holds finger up* It's still called *Safecracker* Evelynn, which is grammatically correct. It's one word, actually, no place to put a comma to begin with.

I came in here just to admire the cool Braum skin, though, don't get me wrong. But if we're gonna have an English fight on the term for a skin and where to place commas to change meanings of sentences, I just...I need to be sure it's settled, forever. *Safecracker*. No argument was ever necessary.

> [{quoted}](name=SelflessTeammate,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=rhpOdFW5,comment-id=0005000000010001,timestamp=2015-08-31T18:51:38.582+0000)
>
> *holds finger up* It's still called *Safecracker* Evelynn, which is grammatically correct. It's one word, actually, no place to put a comma to begin with.
> 


Ty for the knowledge drop! Well played.

> [{quoted}](name=illusydara,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=rhpOdFW5,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-08-30T15:00:35.278+0000)
>
> Shouldn't it be safe *cracker*?

Naw, because with Safe Breaker it lines up better. Say Safe Breaker Braum, then say Safe Cracker Braum. Which sounds better, eh?

> [{quoted}](name=Coriandr,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=rhpOdFW5,comment-id=00050001,timestamp=2015-08-31T01:10:48.214+0000)
>
> Naw, because with Safe Breaker it lines up better. Say Safe Breaker Braum, then say Safe Cracker Braum. Which sounds better, eh?

My personal hero is Bender Bending Rodriguez, so I must stick to my convictions and insist that safe cracker sounds better, as it is a ~~legitimate ~~profession.

If nothing else, we can agree that that skin idea is f'n awesome.
especially if you say it with Braum's accent
The Braum skin I never knew I wanted... until now. I wonder how his abilities would translate visually though?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot NeuroCat,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=rhpOdFW5,comment-id=001b,timestamp=2015-09-02T08:11:24.545+0000)
>
> The Braum skin I never knew I wanted... until now. I wonder how his abilities would translate visually though?


The Q: Throw a bag of money
Shield raise: Oubiously just a bigger version of the vault door
Jump to Ally: you just jump :[
R: Like him setting off a bomb? digging a tunnel to escape? idk sorry :( {{item:3070}}

> [{quoted}](name=Tzar Of Top,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=rhpOdFW5,comment-id=001b0000,timestamp=2015-09-02T13:26:55.505+0000)
>

> R: Like him setting off a bomb? digging a tunnel to escape? idk sorry :( {{item:3070}}

Or shattering the ground so hard that coins fly out, hmm? :P
His Q could be a handle/wheel thing of a bank vault
I think this would be a safe investment for Riot.

nooooooooo, we can't do this. I mean it looks cool and all, and I am as well an avid braum player. I play him all the time in ranked, but, braum isn't a criminal. He wouldn't break into a safe. It just doesn't work. 

With eve and twitch it works, but I just don't think it would work with braum.
He want to give the money to the poor :D

> [{quoted}](name=KarKzz,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=rhpOdFW5,comment-id=000d0000,timestamp=2015-08-30T20:27:25.234+0000)
>
> He want to give the money to the **poro's** :D

Fixed that for you :)
But that's why this skin will be good. Skins are meant to give different personailities you wouldn't normally see on a champion.
hes prolly stealing from {{champion:28}}  and{{champion:29}}
Have him break into a safe to save Poros that are being held captive.
His duo lane partner is the Sly Cooper skin Twitch.  Braum prides himself on his ability to support.  He has to help break into the safe!
Oh my fucking god, Take my money and be silent. this is gold.
Don't worry, he is taking your money!
I'd pay so much money to play Braum in a bowler.
I love the concept, but why does the art specifically show a bullet going under his shield and into his ankle?
Shhhhhhhhhh, you saw nothing
if we talk about this one enough we might be able to get rito to make this a thing WHOSE WITH {{champion:201}}

I would enjoy this skin so much more than the El Tigre Braum... I dont have anything against that skin i just dont like it.

This one on the other hand, yes please!

Kinda unusual for the good guy, but I like it! The jolly thief with a heart of gold and a shield he ripped off of the safe from his last heist.

Heck, the art is perfect for the splash.
well skins are meant to change champions aren't they? to provide a different outlook.
Point made. though, there aren't too many skins that do that these days (outside of debonair, gentleman, and arclight skins, anyway, assuming you count arclight)
very true, provides more of a reason to create a skin like this, however i doubt riot would make this and sadly wouldn't be the same splash art
nice
very cool skin idea i would get it

He might steal from Rich and Corrupted and give it to the poor.

Braum, my hero.

Wait who's in the back is it, NOOOOOOOO

New skin Helmetless Helmet Bro with a Gun
That's one big bag of RP.
meh too much shirt pretty good doe
Holy sh*t yes!
It really is perfect. The bowler hat goes too well with the mustache.
Why isn't this a skin? Riot pls.
That is one of the best skin concepts ever.
e_e So macho
I like it
That...is amazing I would buy and start maining Braum just to use this skin.
I don't even play Braum but this is so awesome.
This is what we need !!!
Pls Rito make this happen .  <3 <3{{champion:201}}
